name: Task Wheel Project File
summary: Learn about .TWH files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Task Wheel is similar to mind mapping software but is much more simple. It allows you to visually create processes, brainstorm ideas, list tasks, and move tasks in order to help you focus on your goal. It is designed for business, educational, and personal users.

description: Project file created and used by Task Wheel, an application used to organize goals, ideas, and projects; contains a task wheel, which includes tasks, goals, notes, focus importance, and start and end dates.
